name: random_skin_from_weapon
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool cs_skin_api.
Tool description: retrieve image, price, weapon, class for every released Skin in CS:GO or CS2
API description: retrieve name, price, icon, class and weapon for a random counterstrike skin from a specific weapon
(prices for field tested condition in USD)

(replace weapon_name)

Example: /api/random/AWP

weapon_name.description: The name of the weapon for which to retrieve a random skin.
